Articles.Content:
When i make refueling stations, i usually make them as simple as possible, due to my weak-arse processor not being able to handle too high part-counts.

This time i decided to make something else, some more, aesthetically pleasing.

So, i made the Prometheus!

Stats:

Fuel


  • Electric Charge: 14805 (9 e/s recharge from PB-NUK's)
  • Monopropellant: 6320
  • Liquid Fuel: 10800
  • Oxidizer: 13200
  • Xenon Gas: 16800

Docking Ports:

  • Normal Ports: 12
  • Large Ports: 6

Partcount: 343

The Dock has 6 Rockomax 24-77's for orbital adjustments.

Lastly, the Dock can be taken into orbit in a single launch, given that all liquid fuel and oxidizer is drained prior to launch.

Link for .craft including launcher: Click me for download!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
